/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/opengl_from_scratch.dir/external/glad/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/opengl_from_scratch.dir/src/Renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_from_scratch.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o opengl_from_scratch external/glfw/glfw-3.2.1/src/libglfw3.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXrandr.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXinerama.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXxf86vm.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXcursor.so
